segments.text: Todd , I am so happy you called !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Linda , I wanted to tell you how much I enjoyed our time together last Friday night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Boy , Todd , that was one great movie you picked out ! Thanks for asking me to go with you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had a great time too and was thinking that maybe you might want to join me for a hike to the waterfalls on Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A hike would be great ! Let me pack us a nice picnic lunch , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Linda , that would be a perfect addition .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll take care of the lunch then , and you can take care of the other plans . What time would you like to pick me up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was hoping to leave by 9 o'clock so that it won \ ' t be too hot for the hike .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nine is a great time to get started . I'll see you on Saturday !
segments.speaker: S2
